## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f0f648527ba68ae34fd8b933322846afca713f9d9649424c3cd01ddc9431d9de)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'soultracker' @ 0.1.0 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
